availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison based farm stock driver. Served as a private in Company B of the 7th Regiment from November 1862, until it mustered out on October 5, 1864. Joined the reorganized 7th Kentucky Veteran Volunteers on December 24, 1864, and served through the duration of the war.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860); Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870); 1890 Veteran Schedules; U.S. Civil War Draft Registration Record; U.S., Find a Grave Index, 1600s-Current, “W. L. Biggerstaff (1832-1874)” https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=biggerstaff&GSfn=w&GSby=1840&GSbyrel=before&GSdyrel=all&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=19984665&df=all& (Accessed February 12, 2017.
